name: Tractor-Beam
description:
Tractor beam is a 2d sidescroller where you need to navigate a cow that cant jump and a UFO through the level and if any of them dies or gets destroyed you are sent to the last checkpoint you got to (if you got to any)

energy beams destroy the UFO

cleavers kill the cow

spikes kill both

Art by Shackrum

music by Scartha
